comment: Zilong Su was a very easy professor you will only have 8 assignments in total. 4 of these assignments are discussion post that you can finish in 30 minutes so super easy. Then there are 3 tests but no lockdown browser so they are all easy A's. You also have to go to an art museum and write a paper but its super easy.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Su's class is easy.  There are discussions every week, that go with the textbook and provided videos. There are only a total of 3 tests and no final. Had to complete a museum analysis paper, it was easy and fun. He does not take long to grade.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things
